name: Time Travel Caffe
description:
--- Tutorial ---

When a visitor comes to the cafe, click on him to find out what dish you need to cook.

Then go to the kitchen by clicking on the arrow in the lower right corner.

*Click* on the icon of the book "Book of Recipes" in it you will find out what ingredients will be needed for cooking. (Repeated clicking on the book removes the book).

*Click* on the refrigerator and get all the ingredients

Always put on a dividing board and cut (*Click* on the cut highlight to enlarge the process)

Then add the ingredients to the pan (*Tap* on the area of the pan to speed up the cooking process).

When the dish is ready, *Click* on the icon of this order, which is located in the upper left part of the kitchen, after which the guest will receive his dish, and you will receive your money.
